comment.author: 82214664@N00
comment._content: I bet these folks were happy when the radio was invented.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Outside the headquarters building of the New York Herald. Another paper published there was the Evening Telegram.

Games of the 1911 World Series, between the New York Giants and the Philadelphia Athletics, were played in October, 1911. The Athletics defeated the Giants.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan: Thanks for the additional info.  We'll include it in the description next time we update the record.
